product_overview: Twin Bite Order is a comprehensive restaurant ordering platform for Twin Pizza, enabling customers to browse menus, customize products, and place orders with delivery or pickup options, complemented by robust admin and staff dashboards for efficient restaurant management.
core_goals: Provide an intuitive, seamless online ordering experience for customers with detailed menu browsing and product customization.
Facilitate efficient order management and operational oversight through dedicated admin, kitchen (TV), and crew dashboards.
Implement a loyalty program to reward and retain customers.
Support progressive web app features for mobile and offline usability.
Ensure real-time data synchronization and robust backend integration for order and delivery management.
key_features: Customer Ordering Interface with categorized menu browsing, detailed product cards, and customization wizards for pizzas, tacos, sandwiches, and more.
Cart and Checkout system allowing order type selection, customer information entry, delivery zone mapping, order notes, and loyalty reward application.
Loyalty System featuring stamp-based rewards tracking and redemption at checkout.
Admin Dashboard for managing orders, products, site settings, and viewing analytics.
TV Dashboard providing kitchen staff real-time pending order displays and status updates.
Crew Dashboard for staff operations and system health monitoring.
Customer Ticket Portal for customers to view past order history and track current orders.
PWA capabilities including app installation prompts, offline support indicators, and automatic update notifications.
Integration with Supabase backend for real-time data persistence and updates, alongside Mapbox GL for delivery zone map displays.
user_flow_summary: Customer selects order type (Delivery or Pickup) from the homepage and browses menu categories.
Customer adds products to cart, using wizards for complex customizations when needed.
Customer proceeds to checkout, entering personal info, selecting delivery options, and applying loyalty rewards.
Customer confirms order and receives confirmation with order tracking available via Ticket Portal.
Admin logs in to the Admin Dashboard to manage orders, products, and site configurations.
Kitchen staff uses the TV Dashboard for real-time order preparation and status updates.
Crew accesses Crew Dashboard for operational management and monitoring system health.
validation_criteria: Seamless menu browsing and product customization functionalities with accurate cart updates.
Complete and secure checkout process capturing all required customer and delivery information.
Real-time updates in order status reflected across customer, admin, and kitchen dashboards.
Correct calculation and application of loyalty rewards throughout ordering and checkout.
Responsive design verified on various mobile and desktop screen sizes.
PWA features functioning correctly including offline capability and update notifications.
Admin dashboard supports all management operations with up-to-date analytics.
Integration with Supabase and Mapbox services is stable and performant under load.
